function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of smart home systems in larger housing units","Impact":"Potential increase in electromagnetic field exposure","Mitigation":"Keep smart home systems well-maintained and limit unnecessary use","Technologies":"EMF shielding and electromagnetic field measurement devices","People":"Residents in larger housing units","Owner":"Maintenance personnel and homeowners"},{"Description":"Dependency on internet and Wi-Fi networks for operation and remote control","Impact":"Reliance on external networks for essential functions","Mitigation":"Diversify network access and consider backup solutions","Technologies":"Network redundancy and backup power sources","People":"Residents with smart home systems","Owner":"Network administrators and homeowners"},{"Description":"Transformation of living environments into multi-functional spaces during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Higher risk of indoor air pollution and reduced air quality","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation and air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Air purifiers and indoor air quality sensors","People":"Residents working and studying from home","Owner":"Homeowners and building management"}]}
